name: ABC Hansen Africa
description: ABC Hansen/ Cormall group of comapnies from Denmark manufactures, distribute, imports and exports agro processing and food proceesing equipment and engineer complete tunkey plants for variety of industries with a primary focus on grain storage, milling and oil processing industries> The company specialises in solutions to processor and would-be processors and in depth of knwoledge therefore is not limited to the manaufacturing of machines only, it has succesfully operated maize mills. whaeat mills , oil expelling plants, bakeries, bakery ingredients blending plant, spice millss, dry food milling, extrusion and blending operations
